summary: A Joan of Arc's trial reconstruction concerning her imprisonment, interrogation and final execution at the hands of the English. Filmed in a spare, low-key fashion.
cast: Florence Delay|Jean-Claude Fourneau|Roger Honorat|Marc Jacquier|Jean Gillibert|Michel Herubel|André Régnier|Arthur Le Bau|Marcel Darbaud|Philippe Dreux|Paul-Robert Mimet|Gérard Zingg|Yves Le Prince|André Maurice|Donald O'Brien|E.R. Pratt|Harry Sommers|Michael Williams
title: El proceso de Juana de Arco
